---
title: "NSF Grant Awarded for AI-Powered Code Review Research"
date: "2024-01-15"
description: "Major NSF funding secured to develop AI-powered code review systems for automated bug and vulnerability detection."
link: "#"
---

Our research group has been awarded a substantial NSF grant to investigate AI-powered code review processes. The three-year project will focus on developing intelligent systems that can automatically identify potential bugs, security vulnerabilities, and maintenance issues in code changes, while providing actionable feedback to developers.
